column4: Hey, I am trying to dual boot ubuntu and xp using this guide: http://apcmag.com/5459/dualboot_ubuntu_and_windows_xp, but my grub has failed to load and when I perform 'find /boot/grub/stage1'it gives (hd0,1) instead of (hd0,0) as the guide assumes. Can some help me adapt those three or four commands to work with this location?

Hey, I am trying to dual boot ubuntu and xp using this guide: http://apcmag.com/5459/dualboot_ubuntu_and_windows_xp, but my grub has failed to load and when I perform 'find /boot/grub/stage1'it gives (hd0,1) instead of (hd0,0) as the guide assumes. Can some help me adapt those three or four commands to work with this location?
No it is XP like the guide I linked you to
